headline: Is PepsiCo, Inc. (PEP) the Best Dividend Growth Stock to Buy and Hold in 2025?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Dividend Growth Stocks to Buy and Hold in 2025. In this article, we are going to take a look at where PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) stands against the other dividend growth stocks. Dividend stocks had a challenging year in 2024 as investor interest largely shifted toward technology stocks. […]
